timeline.message:
Package rename pinot-plugin modules (part of #4941).

Renamed packages for various pinot-plugins as follows.

1. pinot-input-format: The input format plugins will be under the
package org.apache.pinot.plugin.inputformat.<format> (where
<format> is avro, csv, json).

2. pinot-file-system: The file system plugins will be under the package
org.apache.pinot.plugin.filesystem.<fs> (where <fs> is adls, hdfs, gcs,
etc).

3. pinot-batch-ingestion: The batch ingestion plugins will be under the
package org.apache.pinot.plugin.ingestion.batch.

Package rename pinot-plugin modules (part of #4941).

Renamed packages for various pinot-plugins as follows.

1. pinot-input-format: The input format plugins will be under the
package org.apache.pinot.plugin.inputformat.<format> (where
<format> is avro, csv, json).

2. pinot-file-system: The file system plugins will be under the package
org.apache.pinot.plugin.filesystem.<fs> (where <fs> is adls, hdfs, gcs,
etc).

3. pinot-batch-ingestion: The batch ingestion plugins will be under the
package org.apache.pinot.plugin.ingestion.batch.

timeline.bodyText: we should ideally move these to spi. I will do this in another PR
timeline.author: kishoreg

timeline.bodyText: It might be better to not re-organize packages in v0_deprecated
timeline.author: kishoreg

replies.bodyText: Ok, I have reverted the package renaming for all of pinot-batch-ingestion.
replies.author: mayankshriv

timeline.author: kishoreg

replies.bodyText: This requires PluginManager to populate this map, by setting fileFormat and classname when loading each input format plugin.
replies.author: xiangfu0
